name: Desert Runner (GianlucaSabatini)
description:
Dash through the scorching savannahs as you try to rake in as many points as possible! While you may only have a limited amount of time to collect your coins, filling up your time meter will keep your remaining time up... so long as you don't mind a more breakneck pace.

This game is a submission as a final for the DATT 2300 course at York University.
